function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Varied spatial and temporal distribution of indoor environmental parameters (e.g., air speed, air pollution concentrations) increase the complexity of accurate IEQ monitoring.","Impact":"Inaccurate monitoring may lead to undetected areas of poor IEQ, potentially causing health issues for occupants.","Mitigation":"Use advanced sensor arrays and data analysis techniques to capture and analyze spatio-temporal variations in IEQ parameters.","Technologies":"Advanced sensor arrays, IoT-enabled monitoring systems, machine learning algorithms for data analysis.","People":"Building occupants, especially those in areas with poor IEQ.","Owner":"Building managers, facility management teams."}]}
